rows.label: tlk4632017402_msg0001
rows.name:
Young Mololo is a wonderful disciple.
I have never known another with a
heart so pure and full of faith.

rows.label: tlk4632017402_msg0002
rows.name:
This is all thanks to the teachings
of Acedia with which Pope Marveni
has blessed us all.

rows.label: tlk4632017402_msg0003
rows.name:
Would you care to study his teachings
with me as well? It is never too late
to build a brighter future!

rows.label: tlk4632017402_msg0004
rows.name:
I see... That is a shame.
You would make a worthy disciple,
I feel, if you set your mind to it.
